com.skysql.java

Class GsonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skysql.java.GsonManager

  • public class GsonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage JSON strings, from and to Java objects. This class requires the definitions of appropriate classes that reflect the JSON structure. If the Java class extends GsonErrors, the errors and warnings are treated with the help of the Logging class.
    Author:
    Massimo Siani

      • toJson

        public static <T> java.lang.String toJson(T obj)
        Generate a JSON from an object.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object.
        Returns:
        the JSON string.

      • fromJson

        public static <T> T fromJson(java.lang.String inJson,
             java.lang.Class<T> objClass)
        Convert a JSON into a Java object. If the Object class is derived from GsonErrors and the object contains errors, this method prints the error and/or warning messages as defined in the Logging.error and Logging.warn.
        Parameters:
        inJson - the JSON as a string.
        objClass - the class of the object.
        Returns:
        the deserialized JSON as a Java object.
